basics.name: Clement Li
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in MIS and Marketing in Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2020

work.position: Not Granted a Seat on the Council
work.summary: The Jedi Council is outrageous, it's unfair â€¦ I'm more powerful than any of them. How can you be on the Council and not be a Master?
highlights: I don't like sand. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere
My powers have doubled since the last time we met.

volunteer.summary: Empire never trained us so we don't know how to shoot at rebel scum
highlights: These aren't the droids we're looking for

awards.title: Participation Award
awards.summary: Participation is awarded to not just the men, but the women and children too as a warm welcome to reality which humankind is prospering.
